Description.Text: The City Warehouse Aparthotel is a popular choice amongst travelers in Manchester, whether exploring or just passing through. The hotel has everything you need for a comfortable stay. Take advantage of the hotel's free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour front desk, facilities for disabled guests, express check-in/check-out, luggage storage. Internet access – wireless, internet access – wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms, heating, desk can be found in selected guestrooms. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. Convenience and comfort makes The City Warehouse Aparthotel the perfect choice for your stay in Manchester.
